objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Fantasy lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about hobbies and free time using slang register
Students create original fantasy themed content about hobbies and free time in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Fantasy story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using slang register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in slang register within fantasy theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with magical
hobbies and free time with enchanted
hobbies and free time with mystical

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
